name: Formatted Input
description: Low-level formatted-field helpers that sync multiple InputPart segments.

use: you need structured inputs (phone, date, currency) with segmented parts.
you want custom formatted objects backed by controllers.
avoid: a regular text field is sufficient.

examples.minimal:
FormattedInput(
  initialValue: FormattedValue([
    FormattedValuePart.static('('),
    FormattedValuePart.editable('555', length: 3),
    FormattedValuePart.static(') '),
    FormattedValuePart.editable('123', length: 3),
  ]),
)

accessibility: Provide clear separators between parts for screen readers.
do: Use monospace fonts for aligned parts.
